Replying to @smakosh 2018-09-25 11:54
@smakosh @Netlify It looks like you're using @gatsbyjs for your site, and that it doesn't expose a form as HTML (which the Netlify build bots need in order to create a form API for you) There is some good info on this in the docs: https://t.co/r9JA6RO6wR and an example: https://t.co/51koEBvVHl
